text: William Horton "Bill" Kurtis (born September 21, 1940) is an American television journalist, producer, narrator, news anchor, and historian who anchored CBS Morning News. He has also narrated crime shows and in movies. Kurtis mostly spent his childhood in Chicago, Illinois. He studied his B.S. degree at the University of Kansas and his J.D. degree at Washburn University of Law. He was married to Helen Kurtis from 1966 until her death in 1977, they had two children (one who died). He is currently partners with Donna La Pietra. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:American television news anchors Category:American television presenters Category:American television producers Category:American historians Category:American television personalities Category:Journalists from Florida Category:Journalists from Chicago Category:People from Pensacola, Florida
title: Bill Kurtis
